page.title: 14TEENAGER'S AMBITIONS
page.content:
We asked 100 14 year olds about their{ambitions.} There were 2 types of ambitions -{fantasy}and{career.} 60 wanted to be either a millionaire or a pop star, 30 wanted to be a member of the Royal Family and 20 wanted to be the Prime Minister.
Career ambitions were different for boys and girls. All the boys wanted to be either rich or famous or both through their career. Football player and record producer were popular choices. For girls hairdresser, teacher and riding instructress were popular.
All but 2 of the 14 year olds asked wanted to be married by the time they were 25.
